text: Xavier Novell Gomà (born April 20, 1969) is a Spanish former and suspended Roman Catholic bishop. He was the Bishop of Solsona from 2010 to 2021. == Early life and education == Xavier Novell was born on April 20, 1969, in Ossó de Sió, Spain. He was ordained a priest on July 6, 1997. == Bishop of Solsona == On November 3, 2010, Pope Benedict XVI appointed him as the Bishop of Solsona. He was consecrated by Cardinal Luis Ladaria Ferrer on December 12, 2010. == Resignation and personal life == On August 23, 2021, Pope Francis accepted his resignation as bishop. Xavier Novell left the priesthood and started a relationship with Silvia Caballol, a writer of satanic erotic literature. On November 22, 2021, they married in a civil ceremony. Because of this, he was suspended from performing any priestly duties.
